findings.title: Unoptimized GAS_AMOUNT_POST_MESSAGE * AVERAGE_TX_PRICE value usage
findings.description: The GAS_AMOUNT_POST_MESSAGE * AVERAGE_TX_PRICE value is used multiple times but the constants themselves are never used separately. It would be optimal to precalculate the value.

findings.title: Unused _setupDecimals function
findings.description: The _setupDecimals function in EthERC20.sol is not used.

findings.title: Redundant code in MessageProxyForSchain.sol
findings.description: The finding indicates redundant code in MessageProxyForSchain.sol contract.

findings.title: Inconsistent event emission in addERC20Token and addERC721Token functions
findings.description: The functions addERC20Token and addERC721Token do not consistently emit events when a new token address is added.

findings.title: Insufficient input validation in addERC20Token function
findings.description: The addERC20Token function lacks proper input validation, which can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Race Conditions / Front-Running
findings.description: A miner/attacker can take advantage of block transaction ordering to manipulate the end result of a block, particularly referring to the well-known 'approve' frontrunning attack on ERC20.

findings.title: Incomplete Code Coverage
findings.description: Whilst there exists tests which provides code coverage up to a passable level, it is our strong recommendation that all code coverage be raised to the acceptable 100% level for all branches.
